/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. A few cars and pedestrians can be seen traversing the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, immersing the viewer in the heart of Beijing's cityscape.
